channel.title: A server
channel.description:
[center][url=http://betapkers.netne.net/webclient.html][img]http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_wPEYt539Qgo/THsjCb4836I/AAAAAAAACK0/3QVyBJA87cI/s320/PlayNowButton2.2.bmp[/img][/url][/center] [center] [center]Promo Video: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mk5eZ8F_yGI[/youtube][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/home.png[/img][url=http://betapkers.netne.net/index.php]B E T A Pkers Home[/url] [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/weblcient.png[/img][url=http://betapkers.netne.net/webclient.html]Webclient[/url] [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/cliiiiiiiiient.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/25008055/client.jar]Client Download![/url] [/center]
[center][u]Why join BETA-Pkers?[/u][/center]
[center]BETA-Pkers has a great, growing and loving community which everybody loves. The forums are growing everyday, bigger and better. The staff members of the server are nice and always reasonable. They will make sure the best outcome happens for the players. The fact that the server is highly stable makes player killing flawless. Perfect switching. No glitching. Smooth interfaces. Great PVP economy. We thrive for stablility in our player killing. We have perfect MOST runescape formulas, and have done our best to bring you the best and smoothest pk'ing ever made.[/center]
[color=black][center][u]A little more on our PVP server:[/u][/center]
[center]This is a PVP server thriving for perfection. Most items are obtained by purchasing them from shops. Other PVP items are dropped by bosses and players. this is not a spawn server, it own a small economy of it's own and it is perfectly balanced. We have implemented Runescapes formulas into our weapons. [most of them] Our shops are located well so you can buy items quick, and begin your pk'ing adventures! This is a perfect PVP server for everyone, come join today![/center]
[center][size=18pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[i]-Takes 5 Minutes To Start Pking And Get Going -Fully Working PvP Point System -Memory Leaks Fixed Thanks To Jinrake -All skills working, trainable skilling area. -Fully Working Dragon Claw Specials -Fully Working Dark Bow Specials -Fully Working Godsword Specials -Fully Working PvP Timer When Entering Safe Zones -Fully Working 100% Clan Chat With Lootshare -Weapon Stats Powered Correctly, No Weapon Overpowered More Than It Should Be -Toggle Gameframes Between 474, 484, 508, and 525 -All PvP Armour -Working PvP Tasks, Complete Them For Rewards -Click For 1k Barrage Casts, 1k Veng Runes, Bolts And Food -4 Bosses That All Drop Useful Pking Items Such As Claws, DFS, Ranger Boots, Elemental Shield, Robin Hood And More -Donaters Tab, Allows Donaters To Recharge Special, Acces Bank From Anywhere, And Restore Hitpoints. NOTE: It does not allow you to use these in PvP Zones -Server Hosted On A VPS 100% Uptime -Minor And Major Updates To Keep Server Fresh (Were Being Serious This Isnt BS Like Other Servers) -Every Skill Works 100% -Perfect Pking, Added Working Timers -Friendly Staff Who Know What Their Doing, No Noobs That Bought Staff -Hoilday Events, And Server Events -Stable Economy -Working Rushing -Webclient and Desktop Client -Donaters Recieve Items Within 24 Hours -Working Mime Random Event + Sand which Lady[/i]
[center][IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/shop-2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/highscores.png[/img]

[center][size=24pt][b] JOIN WHILE THE 50 PKP FOR LOGIN REWARD IS ACTIVE![/b][/size][/center]
